welcomePage.title: Eclipse Java Development Tools (JDT)
welcomePage.intro: This page will help familiarize you with the Eclipse Java development tooling. To get started, read the sections below and click on the related links.
welcomePage.item: The Java Perspectives To do Java development open to the Java Perspective Window > Open Perspective > Java or the Java Browsing Perspective Window > Open Perspective > Java Browsing.

Create Java components To start create a Java project. Select the newly created project and choose File > New > Other... . In the left column of the wizard, select Java and double click on Java Package in the right column. Fill in the name of your package and click Finish.
To create a Java class, select the package in the navigator view and click on the "Open the New Wizard" toolbar button (on the far left of the toolbar). This toolbar button provides us with a quick alternative to File > New > Other... . Choose Java Class in the right column of the category Java, and click Next. In the class wizard fill in the name of your class and click Finish to create the class and start editing it.
Learn more To learn more you can browse the Java Development User Guide.
